p: The production of essential oils from orange peel is economically viable since this bio-residue has high added value [ 174]. Citrus essential oils can be used directly as flavorings in foods and beverages and the production of medicines, cosmetics, and cleaning products [ 7, 175]. Additionally, orange fiber was shown to be a promising fat replacer in ice cream production leading to a 70% reduction of fat without significantly affecting product attributes such as color, odor, and texture [ 176].
